mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM(SELECT rownum rn,a.* FROM( SELECT notice_num,company,title,org_file_name,hit,writer,regdate FROM notice_yungyuchoi ORDER BY notice_num desc)a)b WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{current_page}-1)*#{per_page_num} AND (#{current_page}*#{per_page_num})-1

SELECT * FROM NOTICE_YUNGYUCHOI WHERE company= #{search_company} AND regdate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{search_regdate_start},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{search_regdate_end},'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.9999 AND title LIKE '%'||#{search_title}||'%' AND writer= #{search_writer}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_yungyuchoi SET hit=hit+1 WHERE notice_num=#{num}
